addComment(bytes32,bytes32,string,bytes3.notice: Adds a top-level comment to a host node.

deleteComment(bytes32).notice: Deletes a comment by marking it as non-existent.

getHostComments(bytes32).notice: Retrieves all comment IDs for a host node.

publish(bytes32).notice: Publishes a comment, making it visible.

reply(bytes32,bytes32,string,bytes32).notice: Adds a reply to an existing comment.

unpublish(bytes32).notice: Unpublishes a comment, hiding it from view.
